name: Claris Goes to the Store (Because She Ran Out of Yeast)
name_original: Claris Goes to the Store (Because She Ran Out of Yeast)
description:
Claris is baking a batch of bread for her bakery, but there's a problem.

She ran out of yeast! (which is important for baking bread)
So she has to go to the store that's conveniently across a busy street.

Controls:

Arrow keys / WASD
Move / jumpF3Change window size
Space (in cutscenes)
Skip cutscene
